snippet.title: Cursed Dawn | Release Date Announcement Trailer | indie.io
snippet.description:
Get ready to unleash chaos—watch the Cursed Dawn release date reveal and prepare for relentless zombie mayhem! Available April 7, 2025 on Steam!

Wishlist Now 💀 ➤ https://bit.ly/CursedDawn 

Cursed Dawn is a wave survival FPS featuring complex maps packed with secrets, dynamic spawns, and hordes of zombies to turn into gory mulch. Plan your defense, stay on the move, and master the maps. Remember: Nowhere is safe, death is assured, how long until you're zombie chow?

🌿 Survive relentless waves of zombies
🔥 Use environmental traps and physics-based mechanics
🧟 Face off against diverse and deadly zombie types
🔫 Wield over two dozen powerful weapons

Visit indie.io on Steam ➤ https://bit.ly/4e91q5q

#CursedDawn #ZombieShooter #FPS #Gaming #IndieGame #Steam
